body:
Hi Theodore,



Sounds great! Let's start getting you involved in Butterfly then. I will create a github repository so we can communicate effectively. The new version for OpenFOAM for Windows is pretty new and is [available only by request](https://twitter.com/openfoam?original_referer=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.openfoam.com%2Fnews%2F&profile_id=212604814&tw_i=616617240155303936&tw_p=embeddedtimeline&tw_w=348369787212140544). There are also alternate options for Windows such as this one: [http://www.cfdsupport.com/openfoam-for-windows.html](http://www.cfdsupport.com/openfoam-for-windows.html)



Mostapha
